alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lee, Clarendon, Sumter, southeastern Richland and southeastern Kershaw Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Bishopville to Millwood to near Poinsett State Park. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sumter, Manning, Bishopville, South Sumter, Summerton, Alcolu, Woods Bay State Park, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Elliott, Mulberry, Lee State Park, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, Poinsett State Park, Turbeville, Mayesville, Pinewood, Lynchburg, Paxville, and Cane Savannah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 106 and 126. Interstate 95 between mile markers 110 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
